objects.text:
• Color-changing LED sole
• Rechargeable USB battery
• 8-10 hours lighting time
• Multiple lighting modes
EARLY BIRD DISCOUNT - LIMITED TIME ONLY!

product_details.name: Luminous LED Sneakers - Light Up Your Steps in Style!
product_details.description:
• Color-changing LED sole with vibrant purple illumination
• Rechargeable battery with USB charging capability
• Durable and comfortable lightweight design
• Water-resistant construction for everyday wear
• Multiple lighting modes and patterns
• Up to 8-10 hours of continuous lighting time
• Perfect for parties, concerts, and night activities
• Classic sneaker style with modern technology
• Easy-to-clean synthetic upper material
• Available in various sizes for adults
• Non-marking rubber outsole
• On/off switch for battery conservation

banner_details:
This vibrant banner showcases a bold and futuristic style, emphasizing a tech-savvy, fashion-forward aesthetic. The background features a deep purple-to-black gradient with soft glowing circles and neon-outlined rectangles for depth. The central heading (`heading`) is a large, high-contrast white text delivering a powerful message, complemented by a sleek tagline (`tagline`) in semi-transparent neon purple, reinforcing the glow theme. The feature description (`description`) highlights product benefits using bullet points in a clean white font. A limited-time offer (`offer`) grabs attention in bright red. The price (`price`) is prominently styled in bold purple, supported by a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) and text (`cta`). The product image (`product_image`) integrates seamlessly with the glow effect of the shoes. 

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple: `#0A001A`
- Neon Purple: `#9933FF`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Light Purple Glow: `#6600CC`
- Highlight Red: `#FF3366`
- Accent Black: `#050012`
product_color: The product image features LED-illuminated sneakers with a dominant purple glow, showcasing a futuristic and vibrant aesthetic. The sneakers themselves are primarily white (#FFFFFF), which provides a neutral base that amplifies the bright violet LED light at the sole. The LED glow transitions smoothly from soft lavender (#B388FF) to a vivid electric purple (#8C52FF), creating a blended luminous effect. The glowing circular dots in the sole merge white and light violet (#E0BBFF), enhancing depth and contrast. The background uses a deep black (#000000) to ensure the lighted elements pop vividly. For an advertisement banner, a palette of white, electric purple, lavender, and black would maintain visual harmony and impact.
